Class Defaults

java.lang.Object
ac.simons.neo4j.migrations.core.Defaults
public final class Defaults extends Object
Defaults for Migrations configuration.
Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Michael J. Simons

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final boolean
    AUTOCRLF
    Default setting for autocrlf.
    static final String
    AUTOCRLF_VALUE
    Same as AUTOCRLF but as string value to be used in configuration that requires defaults given as string.
    static final Charset
    CYPHER_SCRIPT_ENCODING
    Default encoding for Cypher scripts.
    static final String
    CYPHER_SCRIPT_EXTENSION
    Default script extension to look for.
    static final MigrationsConfig.CypherVersion
    CYPHER_VERSION
    Default setting for cypherVersion.
    static final String
    CYPHER_VERSION_VALUE
    Default setting for cypherVersion but as a string value to be used in configuration that requires defaults given as string.
    static final String
    DEFAULT_USER
    The default Neo4j user to use.
    static final List<String>
    LOCATIONS_TO_SCAN
    Default locations to scan (with a Location.LocationType prefix).
    static final String
    LOCATIONS_TO_SCAN_VALUE
    Default locations to scan (with a Location.LocationType prefix).
    static final String
    LOCATIONS_TO_SCAN_WITHOUT_PREFIX
    Default package or folder name for locations to scan, agnostic to classpath or filesystem.
    static final boolean
    OUT_OF_ORDER
    Default setting for outOfOrder.
    static final String
    OUT_OF_ORDER_VALUE
    Same as OUT_OF_ORDER but as a string value to be used in configuration that requires defaults given as string.
    static final MigrationsConfig.TransactionMode
    TRANSACTION_MODE
    Default transaction mode to use.
    static final String
    TRANSACTION_MODE_VALUE
    Same as LOCATIONS_TO_SCAN but as string value to be used in configuration that requires defaults given as string.
    static final boolean
    USE_FLYWAY_COMPATIBLE_CHECKSUMS
    Default setting for useFlywayCompatibleChecksums.
    static final String
    USE_FLYWAY_COMPATIBLE_CHECKSUMS_VALUE
    Default setting for useFlywayCompatibleChecksums but as a string value to be used in configuration that requires defaults given as string.
    static final boolean
    VALIDATE_ON_MIGRATE
    Default setting for validateOnMigrate.
    static final String
    VALIDATE_ON_MIGRATE_VALUE
    Same as VALIDATE_ON_MIGRATE but as string value to be used in configuration that requires defaults given as string.
    static final MigrationsConfig.VersionSortOrder
    VERSION_SORT_ORDER
    The sort order used for version numbers, please see MigrationsConfig.VersionSortOrder.
    static final String
    VERSION_SORT_ORDER_VALUE
    Same as VERSION_SORT_ORDER but as string value to be used in configuration that requires defaults given as string.
